reviews.review:
One word to describe this game: annoying

I only really kept playing because of the story (which was quite uninteresting and predictable). The combat consists of you standing in front of the enemy and holding the trigger and then turning to the next and repeating. There is some long-range shooting too. One third of the game is just driving, which feels the same at all times and the game is overall too short. I though that was the end of a section, but it was the end of the game after only 10 hours.

I was really surprised to see this had a better metascore than Portal 2; smh.
I mean do I even need to make a positive review here
I was iffy at first, but no this game is worth it by far. Simply amazing, regret not playing this earlier.
Mejor juego con historia de  Gabe Logan Newell... y sin el no existirian los que conocemos hoy CS:GO Y GMOD

è¿™ä¸ªç»å¯¹æ˜¯ç¥ä½œï¼Œæ— è®ºä»å‰§æƒ…è¿˜æ˜¯ç”»é¢æ¥è¯´ã€‚è€Œä¸”åœ¨åå¹´åå»ç©ä»ç„¶æ˜¯ä¸ªå¸å¼•äººçš„æ¸¸æˆã€‚
Classic.

Pues, que puedo decir, ahorita lo estoy rejugando porque simplemente es lo mejor que he jugado en todos mis aÃ±os de jugador desde la Sega MegaDrive II, y es un juego que jugue por primera vez hace aÃ±o y pico o dos y aun asi "se me ha caido la baba" al jugarlo. Half Life 2 es sencillamente una obra maestra, rebosa maestria. El gunplay esta genial, la banda sonora, la historia, el diseÃ±o de niveles, el gameplay de por si. Es que lo juego ahora y lo comparo con los juegos de hoy y solo deja ver como la industria a dado un paso atras en la actualidad. Half Life 2 sabe contarte una historia sin dejar de ser un videojuego, me explico:
Half Life 2 carece de cinematicas, 0. No eres ningun espectador, eres el protagonista. El cual presencia todos esos hechos que suceden durante la aventura. Todo muy bien conectado con el gameplay, en ningun momento sientes que "te quiten el control", en ningun momento te cortan el rollo. En ese sentido es para quitarse el sombrero, un trabajo ejemplar. Porque despues tienes los juegos de hoy y no dejan de ser "matar enemigos hasta llegar a la siguiente cinematica", las cuales es lo unico que te cuenta la historia sin esa chispa de lo que es realmente un videojuego. Los de Valve lo saben, From Software tambien con su gran saga Dark Souls. El saber contarte una historia como lo que es, un videojuego.

Graficamente a pesar de sus aÃ±itos, ha envejecido de lujo, ni si quiera me da la sensacion de jugar a un juego con muchos aÃ±os a sus espaldas. Y el diseÃ±o de niveles, el juego no va solo de recorrer un mapa lineal y disparar a todo enemigo, hay buenos puzzles, hay exploracion (si, a pesar de ser lineal tienes que averiguar por donde ir, explorar y seguir la aventura, y ojo nunca te va a llevar de la mano, no hay mapa, ni brujula que te marque el camino ni niguna ayudita, AMEN por eso), esta todo bien colocado y es mas, te ofrece distintas formas de resolver los momentos, eleccion del jugador, Â¿que quieres ser tradicional y matar a balazo limpio? Puedes. Â¿Quieres usar el arma de gravedad unicamente? Tambien, puedes incluso coger objetos del entorno y usarlos como escudo, o lanzarles objetos a los enemigos y ya ni digamos si coges unas cuchillas y mutilas a diestro y siniestro). Y bastantes detalles tiene, se nota que es un proyecto hecho con muchisimo cariÃ±o.

Y creo que poco mas puedo decir, es una maravilla, una obra de arte que todo videojugador que se precie debe jugar si o si, de esos juegos que perduraran como de los mejores juegos de la historia. Ojala pronto Valve nos sorprenda con un tercer capitulo, pero es indiscutible que Valve se haya marcado un juego con una calidad que ya quisieran el resto de desarrolladoras si quiera acercarse un poco, y eso que no he hablado de Portal 2 aun.

Haz un favor a tu espiritu videojuguil y COMPRA este juego, disfrutalo y saborealo bien.

è¿™æ¸¸æˆç®€ç›´å°±æ˜¯ç»å…¸å¥½å§ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆå¥½æµ‹è¯„çš„å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand Half Life 2. The humour is extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of theoretical physics most of the jokes will go over a typical viewerâ€™s head. Thereâ€™s also Gordonâ€™s nihilistic outlook, which is deftly woven into his characterisation- his personal philosophy draws heavily from Narodnaya Volya literature, for instance. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of these jokes, to realise that theyâ€™re not just funny- they say something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike Half Life 2 truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldnâ€™t appreciate, for instance, the humour in Gordonâ€™s existential catchphrase "Crowbarâ€ which itself is a cryptic reference to Turgenevâ€™s Russian epic Fathers and Sons. Iâ€™m smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as Gabinâ€™s genius wit unfolds itself on their television screens. What fools.. how I pity them. ğŸ˜‚

And yes, by the way, I DO have a Half Life 2 tattoo. And no, you cannot see it. Itâ€™s for the ladiesâ€™ eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that theyâ€™re within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kid ğŸ˜

Finally got around to starting this game after years of putting it off since I wanted to play Half Life 1 first. Finally did it and was psyched that I did cause its way cooler after playing the first, than it was when I previously started a game without having experienced the first.

Im only 5 minutes in and Im amazed at the detail in this game and the physics. They simply dont make games of this quality anymore.

Will update as I go through the game.

LO BUENO

+La historia es muy interesante y se cuenta atreves de gameplay no atreves de cinemÃ¡ticas ni textos 
+Los personajes son muy carismÃ¡ticos (hasta los personajes ambulantes)

Great game, buy via Orange Box for free TF2 hats and to save money. Steampipe update broke many things but Valve has fixed it up (blinking NPCs and Combine AI), and you gain access to HL2:Update

Pretty good game,lets just get into the pros and cons

Pros
-Really have good story
-updated graphics from the first one
-If you buy this game you can help other game like gmod or somethin'
-Because its an old game you can play it with any computer (i think)
-its worth the 10 hours gameplay (even though i finished it 9.8 hours)

cons
-the AI [i]kinda stupid[/i] i mean its acceptable cause its an old game so yeah :/

Incredible game. If you haven't played it, do it.
The graphics aren't new or anything, but still doesn't look that bad considering that this game was made in 2004.
Also the game is not demanding at all and can probably run on everything from 2010 - present.
The lore is the best ever. Just. The best.
Gameplay is good and the physics really makes the game feel alive. Just one thing: The game is childishly easy on "easy" and "normal". So just put it on hard and ignore the other two options. And don't watch any playthroughs as this game is best enjoyed unspoiled. If the graphics doesn't satisfy your needs, there is a mod called [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/290930/HalfLife_2_Update/]Half life 2: Update[/url]
So, do yourself a favor and play it. If you already have played it, do it again
10/10

One of if not the greatest game ever. The Half life series is the Godfather of PC games.

I wanted to write this review before I put any more hours into it. There is nothing I can really say about that hasn't already been said: This game is a masterpiece, it's a classic and a perfect sequel to Valve's flagship game. I finished this game after fourteen hours, most fo that time was spent screwing around with the physics and general bullcrappery. It's a fun and awesome game and I reccomend it highly to anyone looking for a worthwhile experience.

Half Life 2 is one of the best single-player experiences Steam has to offer. Personally my favorite single-player game of all time. This game is still viewed as one of the best games on PC, even 15 years later.

Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ° Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞµĞ¹ ,Ğ²ÑĞµ ĞµÑ‰Ğµ Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ°Ñ ,Ğ¸ ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½ĞµÑ‚ÑŒÑÑ
One of the classics. Epic game. One of the best singleplayer games to date.

This is simply the best game of all time. Just finished for the 4th time. Steam, please give us the next half life game.  It will be the biggest release in all of gaming history. So even if it is somehow not satisfactory you'll still earn an enormous revenue. So, you've got nothing to lose. 
I can speak only for myself, and all i wanna say is that i don't even care how it will be. I just want some more of half life man, as do all of the fans. 
It is just criminal to end the 2nd episode in the biggest twist in the game and not follow it up. 

Anyway, steam people, if you guys are reading this, i just want to thank all of you for making my life so much better. Please keep making games just like before. Don't change the "single player narrative-driven" approach to games. I think we all need a little bit of old-school hardcore gaming in our lives just like in the earlier steam games.

Thank you, Steam.
